description: Serbia's president was furious over a Facebook post that likened him to Sharon Stone in Basic Instinct.
title: Putin apology to Serbia over Russian spokeswoman Zakharova
title_page: Putin apology to Serbia over Russian spokeswoman Zakharova - BBC News
maintext: "If you are invited to the White House but your chair stands like you are in an interrogation, you should sit like in the picture number 2. Whoever you are. Just trust me," Ms Zakharova wrote.
